attributes.action: Abandon changes to Agricultural Property Relief announced in the Budget
attributes.additional_details: Farmers work in an industry with significant physical danger, as well as isolation and mental health issues. Some farmers have already taken their own lives as a result of the Budget announcement. We depend on our farmers for our food and maintenance of our natural environment and the Budget, for many family farms, heralds the end of a way of life.
attributes.background: Have a debate and free vote on the removal of Agricultural Property Relief taking into account our food security & preservation of natural habitat. The combination of low profits and the inter-generational nature of family farms combines with this change to present an existential crisis for farmers.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the a similar action:  

Don't change inheritance tax relief for working farms
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700138
